articles.description: Garry White has been making coffee from his floating cafe for sailors and swimmers in Middle Harbour for 20 years. He counts captains of industry and former prime ministers, including Paul Keating, among his customers.
articles.content:
"There are ladies who change to decaf coffee," he says. "That's the first indication of pregnancy."
Mr White brews coffee and steams milk to make cappuccinos, macchiatos and piccolos aboard a small … [+2657 chars]
